page.title: 18Our School Fayre.
page.content: On Saturday 15th June we had a Summer Fayre at our school. At half past one it was the fancy dress and my friend won dressed up as on old lady. Then at 2 o.clock the gymnasts did their part. I am in the gymnastics with my friend. Then at 2.30 the country dancers performed. At 3 o.clock it was the " knockout" in which my friend took part. There were lots of things to have a go on like the bouncy castle, the ponies, children's motor bikes and there were lots of stalls like the cake stall and the plant stall. There was a place which sold tea and coffee. The tea just tasted like plain warm water and you couldn't have two lumps of sugar with your coffee.
